spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout adherence. Adjacency and room proportions are mostly preserved. The main entry door and bedroom door orientations are swapped (opening outwards/incorrect swing direction). All windows and balcony access points are correctly placed.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect fidelity to the structural footprint. Roof is successfully removed, all rooms are present, and there is no text or measurement interference. Floating model on neutral background achieved.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate, matching the plan's unique assets (yellow pillows, specific sofa configuration, rug placement). Small minor scaling issue with the dining chairs.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Correct isometric camera and low-poly geometry. However, the model includes marble-like floor textures and kitchen counter textures which violate the 'no textures/flat colors only' constraint. Natural shadows are a bit more dramatic than 'flat shading' requires.

detected_errors.description: Incorrect door swing orientation for the main entrance and bedroom door.
Violation of 'no textures' constraint; marble textures present on flooring and kitchen counters.
